SEARCH
Package com.example.taskmanager

Class TaskService

java.lang.Object
com.example.taskmanager.TaskService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TaskService extends Object implements Serializable
Provides services for managing Tasks.

Allows adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving tasks. It also supports operations for notifications, searching, and handling category and priority updates for tasks.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskService

      public TaskService()
      Constructs a new TaskService and loads tasks from storage. Initializes the next task ID and updates the status of delayed tasks.

  • Method Details

      message - the message of the notification
      id - the ID of the task
      Throws:

      public void updateTask(int id, String title, String description, com.example.taskmanager.Category category, com.example.taskmanager.Priority priority, LocalDate dueDate, String status)
      Updates the attributes of an existing task.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task to update
      title - the new title for the task
      description - the new description for the task
      category - the new category for the task
      priority - the new priority for the task
      dueDate - the new due date for the task
      status - the new status for the task
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the task is not found
